page.title: 05A remarkable survival
page.content:
Some years ago on Oct the 9th 1964 a boat, with 5 people on board, was wrecked in a severe storm off St Aubin's Bay.
Of the several people on board, all died except for{one women. }She was carried around the coast for a distance of many miles by the tidal currents until the sea finally brought her to the waters below the cliffs north of Vicard. She managed to struggle ashore in the little cove of Petit Port after having been in the water for more than 13 hours.
Her difficulties were not over as the little cove at{Petit Port} is more than half a kilometre from {Egypt Farm. }She managed to struggle up the rough path and reach the farm and help.
